title: Allow BOC user to view existing 7-Day Concussion DL transactions from Player History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user wants to view existing 7-Day Concussion DL transactions from a player's Player History
AND selected player has an existing 7-Day Concussion DL transaction listed in Player History
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the transaction in the player's Player History
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction will open in view mode in the same window
AND all fields will match data discovery
AND user will see a "Close" button on the form in grey

title: Allow user to close 7-day Concussion DL transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN Club or BOC user has completed [C80619]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the "Close" button
custom_expected: THEN user is returned to their entry point into the transaction

title: Allow Clubs and BOC users to create a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction from Player History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club or BOC user wants to create a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction from Player History
AND user has navigated to a player's Player History Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Create New" button on Player's Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should be an option in the top-level dropdown
AND clicking "Transactions" option should cause "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons to be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit the third and fourth levels to only Major items
AND "Disabled List" should appear as an option under Major Transactions
AND "Place on 7 day Concussion DL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown

title: User Selects "Place on 7-Day Concussion DL" option- Preliminary or Rejected Place already exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user has completed [C80631]
AND existing Preliminary or Rejected place already exists in a "Place on 7-day concussion DL" transaction for the selected player, created within last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Place on 7-Day Concussion DL" option
custom_expected: THEN system should open existing Preliminary or Rejected transaction in edit mode

title: User Selects "Place on 7-Day Concussion DL" option- Submitted transaction already exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user has completed [C80631]
AND a Submitted transaction for "Place on 7-Day Concussion DL" already exists for the selected player
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Place on 7-Day Concussion DL" option
custom_expected: THEN the existing submitted transaction will open in View Mode

title: User Selects "Place on 7-Day Concussion DL" option- no transaction exists within the last 10 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user has completed [C80631]
AND no Preliminary, Submitted, or Rejected transaction exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Place on 7-Day Concussion DL" option
custom_expected: THEN a new Preliminary transaction should open in edit mode

title: Allow Clubs and BOC users to save changes to the transaction for later access- Post Approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user wants to save changes to a player's "Place on 7-Day Concussion DL" transaction
AND transaction is in a post-approval state
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save"
custom_expected:
THEN required field and format checks will be made to the transaction
AND the transaction will save and reload in view mode
AND system will display a successful save blue notification (Message #77)

title: Allow Clubs and BOC users to save changes to the transaction for later access- Pre Approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user wants to save changes to a "Place on 7-Day Concussion DL" transaction
AND the transaction is not in a 'Post-Approval' state
AND this is not the first time the transaction is being saved
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction will save and reload in View Mode
AND "Transaction Status" will not change
AND system will display successful save blue notification (message #77)

title: Earliest Reinstatement Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants the Earliest Reinstatement date calculated correctly on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user enters or changes the Placement Date on a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_expected: THEN the system will calculate and display Earliest Reinstatement Date as the 8th day after the Placement Date (including the Placement Date)

title: Allow BOC user to submit a place on 7-Day Concussion DL to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to submit a place on 7-Day Concussion DL to the BOC for approval
AND the form is in a preliminary or rejected status
AND the grey Submit button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN the system should run a required field and format check according to the data discovery
AND the system should run  the On Submit rules check
AND once the rules have passed, the system should update the status of the transaction to "Submitted to BOC"
AND the system should  reload the transaction in view mode, and display a successful submit blue notification
AND the system should create an entry in green font in the player's Player History [Code = DL07J, Description = Place on 7-day Concussion DL]
AND player's major league roster status should change to "7-Day Concussion DL"

title: Allow Club user to submit a place on 7-Day Concussion DL to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to submit a place on 7-Day Concussion DL to the BOC for approval
AND the form is in a preliminary or rejected status
AND the blue Submit button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN the system should run a required field and format check according to the data discovery
AND the system should run the On Submit rules check
AND once the rules have passed, the system should update the status of the transaction to "Submitted to BOC"
AND the system should reload the transaction in view mode, and display a successful submit blue notification
AND the system should create an entry in green font in the player's Player History [Code = DL07J, Description = Place on 7-day Concussion DL]
AND player's major league roster status should change to "7-Day Concussion DL"

title: Allow BOC user to edit an existing place on a 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user wants to make changes to an existing Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
AND selected transaction is opened in View mode
AND transaction is not in Approved or Reversed (including supressed) status
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Edit button
custom_expected:
THEN all fields should be editable
AND Save button should be available
AND clicking save should reload the form in View mode

title: Allow BOC user to edit an existing place on a 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction- Approved or Reversed Status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user wants to make changes to an existing Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
AND selected transaction is opened in View mode
AND transaction is in an Approved or Reversed (including supressed) status
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Edit button
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to attach new files
AND user should be able to edit existing attachments
AND user should be able to update "Comments" and "BOC Notes"
AND clicking Save should reload the form in view mode

title: Allow Club user to edit an existing place on a 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction- Preliminary and Rejected Status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club user wants to make changes to an existing Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
AND selected transaction is opened in View mode
AND transaction is in an Preliminary or Rejected status
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Edit button
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to edit all portions displayed on the form
AND clicking Save should reload the form in View mode

title: Allow Club user to edit an existing place on a 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction- other statuses
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club user wants to make changes to an existing Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
AND selected transaction is opened in View mode
AND transaction is not in Preliminary or Rejected status
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Edit button
custom_expected:
THEN user should only be able to attach new files to the transaction
AND user should not be able to edit existing attachments or any other part of transaction
AND clicking Save should reload the form in View mode

title: Allow BOC user to receive Approval Item when a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL is submitted
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction has been submitted to the BOC
custom_steps: WHEN transaction reaches a status of "Submitted to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN an approval item should be generated and display on the BOC - Major Transactions - Admin's Approvals widget
AND any attached files should be displayed and available for download from the Attachments column of the Approvals widget
AND any comments on the transaction should be displayed in the Comments column of the Approvals widget
AND any flags on the transaction should be displayed in the Flags column of the Approvals widget
AND player name should be a hyperlink in the Approvals widget
AND clicking on the player name will open the Player Profile (defaults to Player History tab) in the same window/tab
AND "Type" should be a hyperlink
AND clicking on the type hyperlink of a submitted transaction should open the submitted transaction in view mode in the same window/tab.

title: Allow BOC user to reject a place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction has been submitted to BOC
AND grey "Reject" button is available (in view or edit mode)
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user clicks "Reject"
AND all On Save rules have passed or been overridden
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status is updated to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification #78 is displayed
AND item is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND player's pending Major League Roster status is reversed
AND pending player history entry is removed

title: Allow BOC user to approve a place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction has been submitted to the BOC
AND transaction is in  Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected status
AND blue "Approve" button is available
custom_steps:
WHEN the BOC user clicks "Approve"
AND all rules have passed or been overridden
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status is updated to "Approved"
AND item is reloaded in view mode if it was in edit mode
AND a successful blue notification (#80) is displayed that states the transaction was approved
AND item is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History is updated: Code = DL07J Description = Place on 7-day Concussion DL, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields should be in black font
AND player's Major League Roster status is set to 7-Day Concussion DL

title: Allow BOC user to reverse a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction has been submitted and approved for a player
AND BOC user sees a "Reverse" button in grey on the transaction
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user clicks "Reverse"
AND all required field and formatting checks are passed
custom_expected:
THEN successful reverse notification (#79) should be displayed
AND transaction status should be updated to "Reversed"
AND reversed transaction is displayed in Player History with "Voided": in front of transaction description (EX:"Voided: Selection to ML Roster‚Äù)
AND any action item generated for Club user is removed

title: Allow user to delete a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to delete a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
AND user has edit permissions
AND transaction is in Preliminary or Rejected sate
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the grey Delete button in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt user with " Are you sure you want to delete this [form]?"
AND clicking yes will delete and close the form and return user to entry point
AND clicking no will return the user to the form and take no action

title: Allow BOC user to suppress a reversed Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has completed [C80828]
AND user wants to suppress the previously reversed transaction
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks the Suppress button on the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN the reversed transaction should be suppressed
AND any notifications generated for the transaction should be removed
AND any action item generated by the transaction should be removed

title: Allow BOC user to "suppress and reverse" Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user has completed [C80811]
AND BOC user wants to reverse and suppress the previously approved transaction
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks grey "Reverse and Suppress" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction should be suppressed
AND transaction should be hidden from player's Player History
AND any notifications generated for the transaction should be removed
AND any action items generated by the transaction should be removed

title: Allow user to cancel creation of or changes to a place on 7-day concussion DL transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the process of creating a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks grey Cancel button
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt user to confirm that they wish to cancel changes
AND confirming cancellation will reload the form in the default mode for the current state with none of the edits made since last save reflected
AND not confirming cancellation will return the user to the form and take no action

title: Prevent BOC user from attempting to reverse a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL that is not the player's most recent approved transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user wants to Reverse a previously approved Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
AND the selected transaction is not the most recent approved transaction for the selected player
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks "Reverse" or "Reverse and Suppress"
custom_expected: THEN user will see error message "Only the player's latest approved transaction can be reversed."

title: Allow BOC user to see flags on submitted transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction is in a Submitted or higher state
AND one or more flags exist for the transaction
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks on the flags icon
custom_expected: THEN a popover should open with the flags that are currently set for the form

title: Allow BOC user to see flags on Approvals item generated by Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an Approvals item has been generated for a place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
AND BOC user sees the Approvals item in the Approvals Items Widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the flag icon on the Approvals Item
custom_expected: THEN a popover with the flags that are currently set for the form should be opened

title: Allow BOC user to see flags for Exam Date being more than 3 days prior
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a submitted Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction exists for a player
AND exam date on the form is more than 3 days prior to current date
custom_steps: WHEN user views the transaction
custom_expected: THEN flag saying "Exam Date entered is more than 3 days ago." should appear

title: Allow Club user to view existing 7-Day Concussion DL transactions from player history
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club user wants to view existing 7-Day Concussion DL transactions from a player's Player History
AND selected player has an existing 7-Day Concussion DL transaction listed in Player History
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the transaction in the player's Player History
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction will open in view mode in the same window
AND all fields will match data discovery
AND user will see a "Close" button on the form in grey

title: Error message when attempting to place a player who is at the MN level
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to place a player on the 7-Day Concussion DL 
AND selected player's pending roster status is at the minor league level
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Place on 7-Day Concussion DL" from the "Create New" menu
custom_expected:
THEN user will receive error "This transaction is for Major League players only."
AND clicking "Back" button will close the modal and return user to the point of entry

title: User attempts to place player with no pending roster status on 7-Day Concussion DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to place a player on the 7-Day Concussion DL 
AND selected player has no pending roster status
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Place on 7-Day Concussion DL" from the "Create New" menu
custom_expected: THEN current roster status should be used

title: Prevent Club user submitting transaction for another organization's players
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club user (ex: club-nyy-mjc-admin)
AND the selected player is from an org other than the logged in club user's org
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Place on 7-Day Concussion DL" on the Create New menu from selected player's Player History
custom_expected: THEN system should show error message: "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization."

title: Error message if Placement Date precedes last game date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve completed DL transaction
AND entered Placement Date is on or before "Last Game Date" 
AND doubleheader option is not checked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN user will see error message "The player cannot be placed on the DL before his Last Game Appearance of..."
AND clicking Back button will return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Error message if Placement Date precedes last game date - doubleheader option
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve completed DL transaction
AND entered Placement Date is before "Last Game Date" 
AND doubleheader option is checked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "The player cannot be placed on the DL before his Last Game Appearance of..."
AND clicking Back button should return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button should ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Error message if attempting to place player on DL out of season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve completed DL transaction
AND entered Placement Date falls before the start of spring training or after the submitting org's Last Day of Season date (including post season)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "The player must be placed between the open and closing date of the season, from {Start of Spring training system date} to {Club's last day of season system date}."
AND clicking Back should close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC Only)

title: Error message if Placement Date is after Roster Affected Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve completed DL transaction
AND entered Placement Date falls after the Roster Affected Date entered on a transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "DL Placement Date must be on or before Roster Affected date."
AND clicking Back button should close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button should ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Error message if Last Game Date is in the future
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed DL transaction
AND Last Game Date entered on the transaction occurs in the future
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "Last Game Date must not be a future date."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Error message if Exam Date is in the future
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed DL transaction
AND Exam Date entered on the transaction occurs in the future
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "Exam Date must not be a future date."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Error message if Injury Date is in the future
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed DL transaction
AND Injury Date entered on the transaction occurs in the future
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "Injury Date must not be a future date."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Error message if Exam Date is more than 3 days ago
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed DL transaction
AND Exam Date entered on the transaction occured more than 3 days prior (can be equal to 3 days ago)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "Exam Date entered is more than 3 days ago. Please enter the most recent exam date for the player."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction

title: Error message when attempting to place a player who is at MN level
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed DL transaction
AND selected player's Pending Roster status is at the Minor League
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "This transaction is for Major League players only."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction

title: User attempts to place player with no pending roster status on 7-Day Concussion DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed DL transaction
AND selected player does not have a Pending Roster Status
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected: THEN current roster status should be used

title: Error message if Placement Date is backdated more than 5 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction 
AND Placement Date on transaction is 5 or more days prior to the current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Placement Date must be within 5 days of submission."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction  (BOC ONLY)

title: Error message if player selected for DL transaction does not have valid MJ roster status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction 
AND selected player's pending (or current if pending is not populated) major league roster status is not Active or Active Pending Contract
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Player must be Active, or Active Pending Contract to be placed on the DL."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction

title: Error message if player selected for DL transaction has a Pending or Approved transaction after the entered assignment date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction 
AND Placement Date on the transaction is before the latest approved or pending (Pending to Club, Submitted to BOC) transaction date for the player
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "A transaction cannot occur before the date of <Roster Name Last Name>'s latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Error message if "Received Medical Director Approval" check box is not checked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction 
AND "Received Medical Director Approval" checkbox is not checked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "A player must have received Approval from a Medical Director to be placed on the 7 Day Concussion DL."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Error message if "Received CDF" check box is not checked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction 
AND "Received CDF" checkbox is not checked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "You must provide a completed Concussion Diagnostic Form in order for the player to be placed on the 7 Day Concussion DL."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Error message if Date of Injury is prior to subsequent assignment to Minor League
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction 
AND player has an approved Major/Minor Outright, Optional Assignment, or accepted Return of Rule 5 Selection transaction with transaction date after the Date of Injury and before the Placement Date.
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Date of injury is prior to subsequent assignment(s) from the Major Leagues."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction

title: Error message when attempting to place player on 7-Day Concussion DL too early
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction 
AND entered Placement Date is more than 4 days prior to the start of their Club's season (use player's Club's Start of Season Date)
AND # of days is a system value that can be changed on the fly, currently "4"
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Player cannot be placed on 7 Day Concussion DL more than {4} days before the start of their Club's season."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Error message when user attempts to save DL transaction without entering comments to explain change to injury details
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction has been submitted
AND user has made changes to the Injury Details on the transaction after it was submitted 
AND user has not entered anything into the "Comments"
custom_steps: WHEN  user attempts to click "Save" on the item
custom_expected:
THEN user will see error message "You must enter comments if updating Injury Details."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction

title: Error message when user attempts to save DL transaction without required fields
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction in Submitted or higher state
AND transaction is missing one or more required fields (marked with asterisk)
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN user should see error message

title: Error message when user attempts to save DL transaction with invalid date format
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction in Submitted or higher state
AND date entered on transaction is in an invalid format (ex: yyyy/m/d)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN user should see error message

title: Error message when user attempts to save DL transaction without Approval From a Medical Director Box Checked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction in Submitted or higher state
AND "Approval from a Medical Director' checkbox is not checked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks save
custom_expected: THEN user should see error message

title: Error message when user attempts to save DL transaction without CDF Box Checked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction in Submitted or higher state
AND "CDF' checkbox is not checked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks save
custom_expected: THEN user should see error message

title: Error message when BOC attempts to approve DL transaction with Placement Date after current date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction has been submitted to the BOC
AND the Approval Item is available in the BOC Approval Items widget
AND Placement Date on the transaction is after current date
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user attempts to click Approve on the item
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "This transaction cannot be approved unless the transaction date is on or before the current date."
AND clicking Back closes the modal and returns the user to the transaction

title: Error message when BOC attempts to approve DL transaction without entering comments to explain change to injury details
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction has been submitted to BOC
AND BOC has made changes to the Injury Details on the transaction after it was submitted 
AND BOC has not entered anything into the "Comments"
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user attempts to click "Approve" on the item
custom_expected:
THEN user will see error message "You must enter comments if updating Injury Details."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction

title: 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction Club Admin Permissons
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club admin (ex:club-nyy-mjc-admin)
AND user's club is the "From Org" or "To Org"
AND transaction is not in Suppressed state
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_expected:
THEN user can create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, view comments and e-sign transaction
AND BOC notes should not be visible

title: 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction Club Basic Permissions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club basic user
AND user's club is the "From Org" on the transaction
AND transaction is not in Suppressed state
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction opens in view mode
AND BOC notes should not be visible

title: 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction BOC Basic Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC basic user
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens any Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_expected: THEN user has view and print permissions but cannot Create New or make any changes or e-sign

title: 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction BOC Admin Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC admin (ex:club-lrd-mjc-admin)
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_expected: THEN user has view and edit permissions including create, delete, and approve

title: 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction Permissions - View
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in user has been granted view permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user opens a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to open and view the form but not make any changes or Create New

title: 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction Permissions - Edit
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in user has been granted edit permissions
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens a Place 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction
custom_expected: THEN user can edit the form, delete , or create new

title: 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction Permissions - Approve
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in user has been granted Approve permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user opens a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction
custom_expected: THEN user can approve or reject the transaction

title: Club Basic Permissions for DL transaction in Suppressed state
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club Basic user
AND a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction exists for selected player
custom_steps: WHEN the Club Basic user attempts to open transaction in Suppressed state
custom_expected: THEN Suppressed transaction should not be available to the user

title: Club Basic Permissions for viewing other club's or BOC's DL transactions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as Club Basic user
AND a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction is in Approved state
AND the selected player is not from the user's club
custom_steps: WHEN user opens Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction for the player
custom_expected:
THEN transaction opens in view mode
AND BOC notes should not be visible
AND comments field should not be visible
